Author: Speakingevil
Description: Five stages of pressing a number, but the answer depends on previously pressed numbers and the positions those numbers were in. Multiple Macro Memory modules combine into a bigger puzzle. Tags: blue, numbers, 4-buttons, stages
Name: Macro Memory

Souvenir.Explanation: Souvenir could ask about the display and button labels (of each module, disambiguated by another label in that stage) on each stage.
